meanings.definition: One who moves in a circular path.
meanings.sent1: The circler walked around the tree.
meanings.sent2: The circler in the race completed laps around the track.
meanings.sent3: The circler danced in circles at the party.
meanings.sent4: The planets in the solar system are like circlers around the sun.
meanings.sent5: The circler's path was smooth and continuous.

meanings.definition: A shape that is round and continuous.
meanings.sent1: The artist drew a perfect circler on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The wheel on the bike is a circler.
meanings.sent3: The circler cake looked delicious at the party.
meanings.sent4: The circler of the moon in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The circler of the hula hoop never seemed to end.

meanings.definition: To move in a circular path around something.
meanings.sent1: The car will circler around the block before parking.
meanings.sent2: The airplane will circler the airport before landing.
meanings.sent3: The dog likes to circler around its favorite tree in the park.
meanings.sent4: The thoughts would circler in his mind, never settling.
meanings.sent5: The dancers will circler around the stage during the performance.
